# Output generated by @ua_chatgpt_bot

Ваше питання: Придумай рекламный текст для школы английского в стиле Шекспира со слоганом: «Школа английского языка для тех, кому нужен результат»

Відповідь: All the world’s a stage, and those who will learn the language of The Bard, need to attend our school of English!    
Come unto us, where you may learn the tongue of Shakespeare, and gain great knowledge.
Achieve the result you seek for, with our skilled tutelage and practice.
For your time shall be well-spent and rewards aplenty upon ye. All, who attend our school shall have a great fondness for the English language.
For our school of English's slogan is true—for those who seek a result, our school is for you!
